Trade/Device Name(s): Sol-Care Safety Blood Collection Needle (with and without Pre-attached Tube Holder)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Sol-Care Safety Blood Collection Needle (with and without Pre-attached Tube Holder) for blood collection and short-term infusion.
Indications for Use Summary: Single use, sterile, winged blood collection needle for blood collection or short-term infusion (up to 2 hours) of intravenous fluids, featuring a safety mechanism to reduce needlestick injury risk.
